DOC.brief_summary: Personalized treatment approach antiplatelet drug choice propose optimize safety coronary stenting reduce heart attack repeat intervention simultaneously minimize adverse bleeding event . This study compare efficacy two laboratory guide treatment algorithm personalize antiplatelet medication choice coronary stenting
DOC.brief_title: Antiplatelet Therapy Guided Thrombelastography Patients With Acute Coronary Syndromes ( TEGCOR Study )
DOC.criteria: Patients admit acute coronary syndrome ( unstable angina , nonST elevation myocardial infarction ) refer coronary angiography . Current therapy clopidogrel ( least 300mg load dose , 75mg po daily > 5 day ) Age range 2175 year . Unable give consent Age young 21 year , great 75 year History stroke Body weight < 60 kg Acute STEMI , Thrombocytopenia < 100'000 , requirement chronic warfarin therapy
